tool_description: Text Sentiment Analyzer inspects the given text or URL and identifies the prevailing emotional opinion within the text, especially to determine a writer's attitude as positive, negative, or neutral. Sentiment analysis is performed through a specifically trained AI.
name: Text Sentiment Analyzer
title: Text Sentiment Analyzer
